casebody.data:
WALKER, et al.
v.
DRIVEN HOLDINGS, LLC 395A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2017 David C. Boggs, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Colin R. Stockton, Attorney at Law, for Walker, Ken, et al. Michael W. Mitchell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jackson Wyatt Moore, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Driven Holdings, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of December 2017 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2017."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 29th day of January 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
